name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Mary S. FRANK, Appellant

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Paul D. Boas, Berlin Boas & Isaacson, Pittsburgh, for appellant.

casebody.head_matter:
514 A.2d 1371
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Mary S. FRANK, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 16, 1986.
Decided Oct. 1, 1986.
Paul D. Boas, Berlin Boas & Isaacson, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Samuel J. Orr, IV, Dist. Atty., Charles S. Hersh, Asst. Dist. Atty., Mercer, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, hutchinson, zappala and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
